title: The Lord Is One

tokens.lyric: All my brethren, can't you hear me say,

lines.raw: [Em]All my brethren, can't you hear me say,

tokens.lyric: The Lord will love you forever and a day?

lines.raw: [D]The Lord will love you forever and a day?

tokens.lyric: All my brethren, can't you hear me say,

lines.raw: [Em]All my brethren, can't you hear me say,

tokens.lyric: The Lord is One
Oh can't you hear me, brother,
And won't you come along
To build the heavenly kingdom,
And sing a brand new song!
Call everybody, try to understand,
We've got to start working, the time is at hand.

lines.raw: [D]We've got to start working, the time is at hand.

tokens.lyric: Call everybody; try to understand.
The Day is come.
Lo, on Mount Zion, the Son of Man appears,

lines.raw: [Em]Lo, on Mount Zion, the Son of Man appears,

tokens.lyric: To rule the house of Jacob for ten thousand years.

lines.raw: [D]To rule the house of Jacob for ten thousand years.

tokens.lyric: Lo, on Mount Zion, the Son of Man appears,

lines.raw: [Em]Lo, on Mount Zion, the Son of Man appears,

tokens.lyric: And cries, "It is done!"
All bound together, nobody can fall;
Loving each other loving one and all.

lines.raw: [D]Loving each other loving one and all.

tokens.lyric: All bound together, nobody can fall,
Our race is one.
Our race is one.
Our race is won!

source:
{title: The Lord Is One}
{key: Em}

{section: Verse 1}
[Em]All my brethren, can't you hear me say,
[D]The Lord will love you forever and a day?
[Em]All my brethren, can't you hear me say,
[C]The Lord is One

{{section: Chorus}
[G]Oh can't you hear me, brother,
[Bm]And won't you come along
[D]To build the heavenly kingdom,
[C]And sing a brand new song!

{{section: Verse 2}
[Em]Call everybody, try to understand,
[D]We've got to start working, the time is at hand.
[Em]Call everybody; try to understand.
[C]The Day is come.

{{section: Verse 3}
[Em]Lo, on Mount Zion, the Son of Man appears,
[D]To rule the house of Jacob for ten thousand years.
[Em]Lo, on Mount Zion, the Son of Man appears,
[C]And cries, "It is done!"

{{section: Verse 4}
[Em]All bound together, nobody can fall;
[D]Loving each other loving one and all.
[Em]All bound together, nobody can fall,
[B7]Our race is one.
[Em]Our race is one.
[C]Our race is won!
